name: FindCreativeSetRequest
desc: The request to find Creative Sets.

items.name: selector
items.desc: Selector objects define what data the API returns when fetching resources. Use Selector objects with Find and Reports endpoints.

items.name: includeDeletedCreativeSetAssets
items.desc:
To include deleted Creative Sets in the response payload, use the includeDeletedCreativeSetAssets query parameter and set it to true as the following example shows. The default is false.
https://api.searchads.apple.com/api/v4/creativesets/<creativeSetId>?includeDeletedCreativeSetAssets=true
